response.overview: The true story of how Ray Kroc, a salesman from Illinois, met Mac and Dick McDonald, who were running a burger operation in 1950s Southern California. Kroc was impressed by the brothers’ speedy system of making the food and saw franchise potential. He maneuvered himself into a position to be able to pull the company from the brothers and create a billion-dollar empire.
response.tagline: He took someone else's idea and America ate it up.
response.title: The Founder

titles.title: The Founder - Die Geschichte wird immer vom Sieger geschrieben
The Founder - Die wahre Geschichte von McDonalds
ファウンダー ハンバーガー帝国のヒミツ：2016
